name: Riverbend Loop
description: A gentle loop trail great for families with children.

name: Cedar Ridge Trail
description: Scenic views with rolling hills and cedar groves.

name: Eagle Peak Ascent
description: A steep climb to the highest point of the park with panoramic views.

name: Meadow Stroll
description: Flat trail through wildflower meadows, great for picnics.

name: Pine Creek Path
description: Follows the creek with multiple small bridges and shaded areas.

name: Sunset Bluff Trail
description: Short hike to a viewpoint perfect for sunset watching.

name: Boulder Run
description: Challenging trail with rocky terrain and boulder scrambling.

name: Maple Grove Walk
description: Flat, shaded walk under maple trees, ideal for fall colors.

name: Highland Ridge
description: Rugged terrain with sweeping views of the valley.

name: Crystal Lake Path
description: Loops around the clear mountain lake, good for birdwatching.

name: Aspen Trail
description: Gentle stroll under tall aspens with plenty of shade.

name: Canyon Run
description: Steep canyon walls and rocky paths, suitable for experienced hikers.

name: Prairie Path
description: Rolling grasslands with open skies, perfect for star gazing at night.

name: Willow Creek Trail
description: Winding trail along willow trees with occasional creek crossings.

name: Summit Challenge
description: The longest and toughest trail leading to the parkâ€™s summit.
